metadata.synopsis: After gnomes throw a sunflash at Steel Watcher at WYR south checkpoint and run away, Manip Edwynna starts commanding and shouting at Flaming Fists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Manip Edwynna - S_WYR_South_Guard_004 e572c6d1-3330-46fd-9ecc-da318f499956 - (2 38)Initiate checkpoint and convince your way into the city. Afterwards, the gnomes throw their grenade and run off. This AD is spoken.

0.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
0.text: Gods damn it all! Find those little bastards, or I'll have your heads!
0.context: NodeContext: calling out to nearby Flaming Fist allies - the 'little bastards' are gnomes who attacked the checkpoint this Fist is guarding
